title: Most popular crisps and savoury snack brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
The difference of Share of respondents currently purchasing between the highest and lowest Snack Brand is 20.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Snack Brand, and Share of respondents currently purchasing in each Snack Brand on the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
The difference of Share of respondents currently purchasing between the highest and lowest Snack Brand is 20.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
Snack Brand Walkers has the highest Share of respondents currently purchasing and KP nuts has the lowest Share of respondents currently purchasing.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing of Snack Brand KP nuts is 1.91% smaller than the maximum value at Walkers.
Share of respondents currently purchasing at Snack Brand Walkers is 42.0 , second place is  at 42.0, and thirdly is Pringles at 26.0.
Snack Brand Hula Hoops, and Pringles have the same Share of respondents currently purchasing.
The lowest value 22.0 at KP nuts is almost 1.49 times smaller than the average value 28.14.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is 197.0 if we add up values of all Snack Brands.
